0.title: [stationName] Last Frost of the Spring or Summer
0.caption: The date of the last spring or summer frost, which marks the approximate beginning of the growing season for frost-sensitive crops and plants. This is calculated from temperature data.

yAxis.left: Last date with temperatures record below 0°C

1.title: [stationName] Last Spring Frost - Difference from Baseline
1.caption: The difference between the date of the last spring or summer frost and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990. This is calculated from temperature data.

yAxis.left: Last date with temperatures record below 0°C Difference
